issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.76:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #237cb8.
issues.description: Features

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.76:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #237cb8.
original_issue.selector: html > body > header > div > ul:nth-child(1) > li:nth-child(1) > a

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).

issues.title: <ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements
issues.description: Ensure that lists are structured correctly

none.message: List element has direct children that are not allowed: ul

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  List element has direct children that are not allowed: ul

issues.title: Lists do not contain only `<li>` elements and script supporting elements (`<script>` and `<template>`).
issues.description: Screen readers have a specific way of announcing lists. Ensuring proper list structure aids screen reader output. [Learn more about proper list structure](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/list).
